summary: The Protect our Parks Act of 2025 aims to ensure the National Park Service (NPS) is fully staffed to guarantee visitor safety and resource protection. It mandates the Secretary of the Interior to take necessary actions to fill NPS positions, including maintenance staff, and reinstate employees terminated since January 20, 2025. Furthermore, the bill directs the continuation of existing NPS projects funded under various acts like the Federal Lands Recreation Enhancement Act and the Great American Outdoors Act.
